name: hypersecretion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the production of too much of a liquid in the body: Mucus hypersecretion can be an important contributing factor to airway obstruction. The condition results in hyper-secretion of gastric acid.
More examplesFewer examplesHypersecretion of insulin will result in hypoglycemia, which is also very damaging.The link between cortisol hypersecretion and depression is based on repeated clinical observations, which have easily outlived attempts to debunk them.Acid hypersecretion is not the sole factor in ulcer development; mucosal changes must also occur.
